data.title: Anti-Gremlin 1 antibody (ab22138)
data.meta_description: Rabbit Polyclonal Gremlin 1 antibody. Suitable for IHC-P and reacts with Human samples. Cited in 8 publications. Immunogen corresponding to Synthetic Peptide within Human GREM1 aa 50-100.
